about_the_game:
Drive a Kei Truck through a collapsing Japan!


You are being chased by aliens, and the last thing you want to do is get caught, so you can't help but panic and break street lights and road signs.

If you think it's a road, it's a road. Run inside buildings, walls, any road and survive!

You are a kei truck racer competing in the Kei Truck Rally 20XX.


While you are blasting through a Kei Truck Rally 20XX, a UFO with aliens crashed into a rice field.

When the aliens exited the UFO, they were seen by everyone on earth.

The startled aliens transport everyone on earth to somewhere else.

But you were not transferred under the influence of a mysterious energy.

The stage is set in a town or countryside where there is no sign of people at all.


Nobody is in the buildings or in the cars.

Aliens who disturb you by destroying buildings and attacking you will be chasing you there.


You dodge collapsing buildings, missiles, and attacks from mysterious mechanical life forms with brilliant driving techniques,

and destroying utility poles, street trees, and guardrails, and

Run through offices and walls.

and fight giant creatures.



It is very dangerous to actually run in this way, so please do not imitate it!

Game progression is based on a stage-by-stage system.

There are stages where smaller enemies appear and stages where you fight giant bosses. There are stages where no enemies appear.

Compete with other players on online leaderboards

The game implements online leaderboards,
where scores and times are recorded for each stage so that you can compete with other players.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4210M CPU @2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try the trial version and you'll see.
